channel.title: Microsoft Teams on Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft Teams on Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 5th of May, 2022
item.description: Three demos Manage data in OneDrive application folder, Using Adaptive Cards control from the PnP control gallery in SPFx solutions, and SPFx Design Patterns – Property pane exception handling. Released React Controls v3.8.0, Reusable Controls v3.7.0 and 4 samples!

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 21st of March, 2022
item.description: Three demos – Introduction to Adaptive Card Design Gallery reusable reference sample, Using Adaptive Cards control from the PnP control gallery in SPFx solutions, and Navigating Cards in Viva Connections ACEs. Released SPFx beta v1.15, CLI v5.2, PnP Modern Search v4.6.1 and 14 samples!

item.title: PnP PowerShell v1.10
item.description: PnP PowerShell is a cross-platform PowerShell Module providing over 600 cmdlets that work with Microsoft 365 environments and more specifically SharePoint Online, Microsoft Teams, Microsoft Planner and Power Automate.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Call – 15th of March, 2022
item.description: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - weekly community call recording from March 15th, is now available from the Microsoft 365 Community YouTube channel at https://aka.

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 10th of March, 2022
item.description: Latest news from Microsoft engineering on Microsoft 365 topics; Three demos: Siddharth Vaghasia – My Emails Viva Connections Adaptive Card Extension, Yves Habersaat – Getting started with Microsoft Graph Toolkit and SharePoint Framework, Paolo Pialorsi – Using Microsoft Graph APIs in Viva Connection ACEs

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 156 - João Ferreira
item.description: In this installment of the weekly discussion revolving around the latest news and topics on Microsoft 365, hosts – Vesa Juvonen (Microsoft), Waldek Mastykarz (Microsoft) are joined by Portugal based, technologist, author, MVP Office Dev and Windows Insider, João Ferreira (Beezy).

item.description: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - weekly community call recording from March 8th, is now available from the Microsoft 365 Community YouTube channel at https://aka.

item.description: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - weekly community call recording from March 1st, is now available from the Microsoft 365 Community YouTube channel at https://aka.

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 24th of February, 2022
item.description: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework bi-weekly community call recording from February 24th is now available from the Microsoft 365 Community YouTube channel at https://aka.ms/m365pnp/videos. You can use SharePoint Framework for building solutions for Microsoft Teams and for SharePoint Online

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Call – 22nd of February, 2022
item.description: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - weekly community call recording from February 22nd, is now available from the Microsoft 365 Community YouTube channel at https://aka.

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 154 - Vardhaman Deshpande
item.description: In this installment of the weekly discussion revolving around the latest news and topics on Microsoft 365, hosts – Vesa Juvonen (Microsoft), Waldek Mastykarz (Microsoft) are joined by London/India - based Developer, Product Owner, Technical Architect, MVP, Vardhaman Deshpande (Valo Solutions).

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Community Call recording – 17th of February, 2022
item.description: One location the Microsoft 365 tenant – script samples gallery (138 scenarios and 193 scripts) now integrated into Sample Solution Gallery! Sign up and attend an AMA and other events this month hosted by Sharing is Caring. Added today - Ask me anything (PnPjs 3.0 – March 15th) and don’t forget the AMA on February 22 – PnP React Controls. Get the recognition you deserve, sign up for the PnP Recognition Program. Released Yo teams - yoteams-build-core v1.6.0 and Microsoft Graph Toolkit (MGT) v2.3.2, and Refreshed the MGT playground! To see current releases and latest updates/nightly builds, access the Repos via the links in table below. There were 6 new/updated script, 46 Bot samples, 2 Power Platform samples delivered this week. Wanted! – Teams Samples.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Call – 15th of February, 2022
item.description: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - weekly community call recording from February 15th, is now available from the Microsoft 365 Community YouTube channel at https://aka.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Community Call recording – 3rd of February, 2022
item.description: One location the Microsoft 365 tenant – script samples gallery (136 scenarios and 187 scripts) including recently added Teams PowerShell support! Sign up and attend an AMA and other events this month hosted by Sharing is Caring. Get the recognition you deserve, sign up for the PnP Recognition Program. Heads down on PnP projects. Expecting to ship Microsoft Graph Toolkit v2.3.2 on Friday! To see current releases and latest updates/nightly builds, access the Repos via the links in table below. There were 5 new/updated script, 5 Power Platform samples delivered this week.

You can use SharePoint Framework for building solutions for Microsoft Teams and SharePoint Online

item.title: Welcome new employee in Teams using Adaptive card
item.description: Let’s make this process simple by using power automate automated flow wherein whenever a new employee is added in Organization’s Team -> General Channel -> Warm welcoming adaptive card will be posted in the channel where the new employee will also be mentioned.

item.title: How to use Graph Toolkit in Teams App inside Teams Tab
item.description: In this article, we will learn about Graph Toolkit and how to integrate Graph toolkit in Teams App.

item.title: Make a bot for simple interactions in Teams using a Webhook
item.description: Have you ever had an idea to ask a bot to perform a simple interaction? Then this article is for you

item.title: Quickly set up Viva Connections app in Microsoft Teams using Teams admin center
item.description: In this article you can expect to quickly add your home site portal as Viva connection app right into your Microsoft Teams

item.title: ProvisionGenie - an open-source provisioning engine for Microsoft Teams
item.description: Once upon a time I teamed up with my friend and partner in crime Carmen Ysewijn.

item.title: Azure Meeting Bot To Capture Meeting Participants Information
item.description: In this article, we will learn about how to create Azure Meeting Bot which can join a team meeting via Power Automate and can log participant’s information.

item.title: Recognize team activity using the CLI for Microsoft 365
item.description: The scenario Not unlike the previous scenario the goal of this blog post is to identify the activities per team.

item.title: Do you need ngrok to develop Microsoft Teams apps?
item.description: If you’ve started down the path of developing applications for Microsoft Teams, you may have seen a tool called ngrok as a prerequisite in various tutorials and lab exercises.

item.title: Setting up https for Teams Tabs projects - without ngrok
item.description: I’ve started using the new Microsoft Teams toolkit, which is a Visual Studio Code extension and generator for Teams applications.

item.title: Let's build a timer app for teams meetings
item.description: Introduction Wouldn’t it be nice to have a timer at meetings, so that everybody can see how much time has passed and how much is remaining?

item.title: Using Power Automate And Graph API To Manage External Access To Teams
item.description: Matt Collins Jones and I presented API’s – The most powerful tool, anyone can use!

item.title: Teams - an adoption idea? Transfer your group chat emails to Teams with Power Automate
item.description: Transfer your group chat emails to Teams with Power Automate

item.title: Change your own profile picture as a Guest in Microsoft Teams
item.description: I love Microsoft Teams and I also love controlling my online appearance, but sadly both aren’t big friends when you are a Guest in another tenant.

item.title: Start building apps for Teams
item.description: Microsoft Teams is a rich collaboration platform used by millions of people every day.

item.title: How to build an FAQ bot for Microsoft Teams with Power Virtual Agents
item.description: In this blog I want to show you, how you can build, test and publish an FAQ bot for Microsoft Teams within minutes.

item.title: How to create an improved Microsoft Teams Files approval process using Azure Logic Apps
item.description: We are all there during some days: Power Automate Premium is the key to the next level but there is no way we could justify that licensing – the ROI is simply not enough.

item.title: How to use Microsoft Teams app templates
item.description: Microsoft Teams can be extended in several different ways using no-code, low-code and custom code solutions.

item.title: Get your To Do tasks daily in Teams using Power Automate
item.description: This blog post is inspired by Ayca Bas’s excellent blog post on this subject using Azure Logic Apps instead of Power Automate

item.title: How to configure and use Incoming Webhooks in Microsoft Teams
item.description: Intro Incoming webhooks are a way to send updates or messages in a channel in Teams without a user interface, typically done via scripts or code programmatically.
